eventDecorators.name: AdminAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an account withdraws funds from RelayHub.

eventDecorators.name: AdminRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an account withdraws funds from RelayHub.

eventDecorators.name: ContributorAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an account withdraws funds from RelayHub.

eventDecorators.name: ContributorRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an account withdraws funds from RelayHub.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an account withdraws funds from RelayHub.

functionDecorators.name: addAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Add the Admin role to an address. Can only be called by an Admin.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address to receive Admin role.

functionDecorators.name: getContributorInfo
functionDecorators.description: Return contributor information about all accounts in the Registry.

functionDecorators.name: getMaxTrust
functionDecorators.description: Return the max trust of an address, or 0 if the address is not a contributor.

functionDecorators.name: isAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Check if address has the Admin role on the contract.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: registerContributor
functionDecorators.description: Register a contributor and set a non-zero max trust. Can only be called by Admin role.

parameterDecorators.name: _adr
parameterDecorators.description: (address) The address to register as contributor.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxTrust
parameterDecorators.description: (uint256) The amount to set as max trust.

functionDecorators.name: registerContributors
functionDecorators.description: Register a list of contributors with max trust amounts. Can only be called by Admin role.

parameterDecorators.name: _trusts
parameterDecorators.description: (uint256[]) Max trust values to set to each contributor (in order).

functionDecorators.name: removeAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Remove the admin role from an admin account. Can only be called by the Owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeContributor
functionDecorators.description: Remove an existing contributor. Can only be called by Admin role.

functionDecorators.name: renounceAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Remove the admin role from the caller. Can only be called by an Admin.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
